name: dungeon-lab
description: A Virtual Table Top (VTT) system for Table Top Role Playing Games

scripts.dev:server: npm run plugins:build && npm run dev --workspace=@dungeon-lab/server
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.plugins:build: for dir in packages/plugins/dnd-5e-2024 packages/plugins/test-dice-roller; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then cd "$dir" && npm run build && cd ../../..; fi done
scripts.plugins:dev: for dir in packages/plugins/dnd-5e-2024 packages/plugins/test-dice-roller; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then cd "$dir" && npm run dev & fi done
scripts.plugins:clean: for dir in packages/plugins/dnd-5e-2024 packages/plugins/test-dice-roller; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then cd "$dir" && npm run clean && cd ../../..; fi done
